topBans.noEntries: susgeeDank There are no bans in the {channel|antiPing} channel
topBans.success: The chatters with the most bans in the {channel|antiPing} channel are: {leaderboard} KEK

topChatter.noEntries: susgeeDank in channel {channel|antiPing}, there was no chatting {delta|include}
topChatter.text: the most active chatters {delta|include} in channel {channel|antiPing} are: {leaderboard}

topSubgifts.noEntries: susgeeDank there are no logged subgifts in channel {channel|antiPing} {delta|include}
topSubgifts.text: the most subgifters {delta|include} in channel {channel|antiPing} are: {leaderboard}

topTimeouts.noEntries: susgeeDank there are no logged timeouts in channel {channel|antiPing} {delta|include}
topTimeouts.success: in channel {channel|antiPing} there are {count|number} logged timeouts {delta|include}

timeouts.noEntries: {user|antiPing} has not yet received any timeouts in the channel {channel|antiPing} {delta|include}
timeouts.userStats: {user|antiPing} has collected a total of {count|plural(one|timeout, other|timeouts)} in the channel {channel|antiPing} {delta|include}

unban.noUsers: susgeeDank could not find any user

unRemind.invalidId: susgeeDank id has to be a number
unRemind.notFound: susgeeDank no reminder found with id {id}
unRemind.notYours: susgeeDank reminder with id {id} is not from you
unRemind.success: susgeeOK reminder with id {id} has been deleted

weather.noUser: susgeeDank you have to pass a user
weather.noUserLocation: susgeeDank this user has no saved location
weather.noLocationSet: susgeeDank enter a city, or send Susgeebot a whisper message saying "weather city" to save your location
weather.locationNotFound: susgeeDank couldn't find a location with this name

youtube.submitId: you have to submit a youtube link/id

7tv.description: Manages 7TV emotes in your Twitch channel. (The bot needs 7TV editor permission from the channel)

7tvEditorList.description: shows users with (7TV) bot editor permissions

7tvSa.description: Shows a user's sub status on (7TV)

activeChannel.description: sends a list of channels where a user has sent a message

addBetween.description: splits each word into a separate message

addBot.description: information on how to add the bot

allEmotes.description: sends all 7TV/BTTV/FFZ/TWITCH emotes from a channel to the chat

animal.description: sends a random picture of an animal

announce.description: send a twitch announcement in chat

ascii.description: Converts an image to ASCII art

avatar.description: sends the link to a user's profile picture

badge.description: shows the current (7TV) badge of a user

ban.description: bans a user in a channel

banMsg.usage: <channel> oder disable, um alle zu deaktivieren

bans.usage: [alltime | today | yesterday | month | lastmonth | year | lastyear] <channel>
bans.description: shows the number of timeouts logged in a channel

bible.description: sends a random entry of the bible database

bibleAdd.description: add a text to the bible database

bibleDelete.description: deletes a text from you in the bible database

bibleList.description: returns the link to the bible page

birthday.description: adds a birthday to the database or removes it

birthdays.description: returns all stored birthdays in the current channel

boobaTv.description: sends a thumbnail of a streamer from booba.tv

bot.description: sets the state of a user to a bot (shortcut for permission bot <user>

botSubs.description: show all sub-emotes the bot currently has

bottiesBan.description: ban a user from using botties

channels.description: returns a link to all channels the bot is joined

channelStats.description: displays the channel stats of the current channel

chat.description: shows if a user is using a third-party app to chat or twitch web chat

chatterino.description: returns links to chatterino forks downloads

chatters.description: displays the current chatters in a channel

chatting.description: shows chatting stats for a user in a channel for a specific time range

clip.description: creates a clip from the given channel

command.description: enable/disable a command in the current channel

deadChannels.description: returns a list of channels with no messages in the past 2 weeks or longer

dislikes.description: shows stats from a youtube video

duhuuuuuuure.description: special shoutout for random user in chat

eCount.description: shows how often an emote has been used in a channel

eCountToday.description: shows how often an emote has been used in a today channel

eCountUser.description: shows how often an emote has been used by a user in a channel

emote.description: displays information about a twitch emote

emotes.description: sends a link to all emotes from a channel

emoteSets.description: shows information about all (7TV) emote-sets from a channel

errorList.description: returns a list of all errors in the database

eSearch.description: search an emote on bttv/ffz/7tv by name

ezGif.description: returns an ezgif link of an emote

fill.description: repeats a given text until 500 characters

firstLoggedLine.description: shows the first message of a user in a channel from https://logs.florian2807.me

followAge.description: displays the follow-state of a user

founders.description: displays the founders of a channel

freeAll.description: removes all timeouts of all users in the current channel

fuck.description: dink a specific user or randomly select a chatter

give.description: give your botties to another user

globalEmoteAnnounce.description: send a notification, when a global badge/emote has been updated from Twitch (7TV) or BTTV

id.description: returns the user ids from Twitch and (7TV)

isBanned.description: checks if a user is banned in a channel

isInChat.description: checks if a user is in a channel

lang.description: changes the language of the bot in the current channel

lastLine.description: returns the last logged line of a user in a channel

lastTimeout.description: returns the last logged timeout of a user in a channel

leaderboard.description: displays the leaderboard of the botties mini-game

lines.description: sends the amount of messages sent in a channel

liveMsgs.description: displays all enabled live-messages in this channel

livePing.description: pings you when a streamer goes live

logs.description: sends a link to user-logs in a channel

loserboard.description: displays the loserboard of the botties mini-game

mass.description: Pings every user in the channel

modAge.description: display the mod-state of a user in a channel

mode.description: changes the mode of the bot in this channel

modLookup.description: displays a list of channels a user is modded

mods.description: displays a list of mods in a channel

mostSent.description: returns the most-sent message of a user in a channel

mostSentChannel.description: returns the most-sent messag in a channel

myBible.description: displays all texts from you in the bible database

nameChanges.description: display past names of a user

noMention.description: allows you to opt-out of being mentioned in a command response

paint.description: displays information about a paint or the current paint of a user

permission.description: display a users bot permission or update it

pick.description: returns a random selected word of a given text

prestige.description: increase your prestige to gain more botties

pyramid.usage: <amount (1-25)> <text> or stop, to cancel the pyramide

randLine.description: sends a random message of a user

randLineChannel.description: sends a random message from the channel

randomPoofAll.description: timeouts all users in the channel with a random duration

receivedSubs.description: shows how many logged subs a user has received

record.description: add/remove a channel from being recorded

remind.description: create a reminder for a user or yourself. reminder can also be set in a given time

rename.description: changes the name in the database after a rename

say.description: says something in a given chat

seRank.description: displays your rank in the StreamElements ranking

spam.usage: <amount (1-50)> <message> or stop, to cancel the spam

split.description: splits each word into a separate message

stalk.description: returns the last seen message of a user

stats.description: display the botties stats of a user

subAge.description: display the subscription-state of a user of a channel

subGiftPing.usage: (whisper) when subgifts should be announced via whisper
subGiftPing.description: add/remove notifications when a subgift for a user is detected

subGifts.description: shows how many subs a user has gifted in a channel

subInfo.description: checks how many subs have been gifted in a channel

suggest.description: suggest a feature or report a bug

timeouts.description: shows how many timeouts a user has in a channel

topBans.description: shows the most banned users in a channel

topChatter.description: shows the most active chatters in a channel

topSubGifts.description: displays the users with the most subgifts in a channel

topTimeouts.description: displays the 10 most timeouted users in a channel

unbanList.usage: <raw user list url, one user per line>

updateMsg.description: enable/disable title and category updates for a channel

user.description: shows information about a twitch user

vanish.description: you will be timeouted for 1 second

vipAge.description: display the vip-state of a user in a channel

vipLookup.description: displays a list of channels a user is viped

vips.description: displays a list of vips in a channel

weather.description: displays weather information on a given location

xd.description: restarts the bot, pulls from git, reload commands/modules

yoink.description: yoink an emote and add it to your channel (with an optional alias)

weather.alreadySet: You have already set a weather location: {city}. If you want to change it, send a whisper with 'weatherupdate <city>'.
weather.weatherSet: Weather location successfully set. To change your location, use 'weatherupdate <city>'.
weather.noArgs: Please provide a city. Example: 'weather Berlin'.
weather.noWeatherLocationSet: You haven't set a weather location yet. Please use 'weather <city>' to set one.
weather.noArgsUpdate: Please provide a city. Example: 'weatherupdate Berlin'.
